item.title: Header files in Rcpp
item.description: In C++ you can create functions in order to help organize your code. This is helpful as your project grows or if you have a task that is performed by a function that several other functions may call. However, the functions you create are only visible to the other funcitons that are contained in a single source file. As your project grows, you may want to distribute your functions among several files.
